resources.string: I am an aspiring Android developer of the Kotlin language. I spend my free time studying new mobile technologies, testing newfangled features and developing my project.
The application is a continuation of the Alcyone project of the same name, which I worked on as a college student.

The parity of the week is determined by a special method.If the week number is divided into two without remainder, it is an even week, if not, it is an odd week. As a rule, the first school week is odd, then they alternate.
A separate Telegram channel will be created for communication in the future. Follow the news!
Turn it on if the parity doesnt match your study schedule. It is recommended to restart the application to apply the settings.
Select your study group to get the current schedule.
